EmailTemplate.description: Response for Leads received from Partner Web Lead Campaign
EmailTemplate.name: New BD Web Lead
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Name}
Thank you for your interest in becoming our partner!
A member of our team will be contacting you within the next 24 hours to finalize your application and answer any questions you may have. We look forward to speaking with you.
Sincerely,
Business Development Team (240) 514-2000 ext. 2009 bd@rapidadvance.com
